scripts.postbuild: rm -rf dist/src && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='dist/index.html';if(fs.existsSync(p)){const html=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8').replace(/\n\s*<script type=\"module\" src=\"\.\/src\/main\.tsx\"><\/script>/,'').replace(/\n\s*<script type=\"module\" src=\"\/src\/main\.tsx\"><\/script>/,'');fs.writeFileSync(p,html);}"
